name: WIC - Women, Infants, and Children
short_desc: Nutrition program for pregnant women, infants and children. Breastfeeding helpline provides breastfeeding advice
description: Supplemental nutrition program for pregnant and breastfeeding women, infants and children under 5. Offers nutrition information, group sessions, and food coupons for individuals in need. Also provides breastfeeding classes, Breastfeeding Help Line, breast pumps and lactation consultants.BREASTFEEDING HELP LINES AT WIC: Call for advice from a WIC Breastfeeding Counselor during business hours. Please call the WIC office where WIC assistance is usually received. These sites have separate Breastfeeding Help Lines: TELEGRAPH. EASTMONT, HAYWARD and FREMONT: 510-595-6470.
